TopicTitle: Landing gear lights turn on while stowed

Articles.Content:
Reported Version: v0.1.2 (latest) | Mods: none | Can replicate without mods? Yes 
OS: windows | CPU: ryzen 7 | GPU: Nvidia Geforce GTX 1660 | RAM: idk

 

Was flying a big ol' plane, and pressed the lights button. The LY-99 landing gear were stowed, but the landing lights on them turned on and the light beam leaked through the stowed gear and onto my wing.
